subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|さく}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=さく}} {{m|zh|作|tr=tsak||to do, to work}}. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} reading ''zok<sup>3</sup>'', {{etyl|wuu|-}} ''tsoq'' (T4).

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|さく}}

# a [[work]], a [[production]] {{qualifier|particularly a cultural work, such as a work of art, of literature, or of theatre}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|つく|o1=り}}
The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|作る|tr=tsukuru||to make; to build; to work the land, to grow something}}, itself from {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=つくる}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: More often spelled with the [[okurigana]], as {{m|ja|作り}}.

subSections.title: Suffix
Usage notes
subSections.text: More often spelled with the [[okurigana]], as {{m|ja|作り}}.
